title: Postpartum Hemorrhage Response Simulation Training: Evidence-Based Instructional Design Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and emergency response protocols
context.additional_context: Training for medical device manufacturer employees, including real-world medical simulation environments and digital equipment-based training

learning_goals: Perform initial response procedures within 5 minutes according to evidence-based protocols when postpartum hemorrhage occurs
Establish a diagnosis of the cause of bleeding and a treatment plan within 15 minutes through role allocation among team members
Apply emergency treatment skills with over 80% accuracy in real clinical environments based on simulation scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
